title: Please give LB her silence back.
body: Now she struggles to kill cancer like Fizz.

replies.body: please bring cancer killer back rito :D
If you do your job correctly you should never need the silence in the first place ._.
Nah, just give her a polymorph instead so she can be even more OP.

> [{quoted}](name=Kartoffeln,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QFupqfZL,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-07T08:41:51.832+0000)
>
> Nah, just give her a polymorph instead so she can be even more OP.

LeBlanc was hardly OP when she had her silence. She was literally unchanged for a whole season before she became flavour of the month and everyone started playing her. There are worse champions out there requiring nerfs.

In all honesty I think a compromise should be a silence is applied on the mimic version's sigil of malice. This leaves the same level of counter play available and still means the correct use of mimic for different situations has to be thought through.

The reason Riot removed silences from all assassin kits is because it makes them impossible to play against. LeBlanc can still one-shot squishies if she does it right. Now, if she screws up the squishy might live. Then again, she still potentially has three dashes, so probably not.
